trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.TimeSpan> expressed in seconds or as a standard infinite time span.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.TimeSpan>表示以秒為單位，或做為標準無限時間範圍</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: This type, like all the other configuration converter types, converts strings found in the configuration file to and from the related strongly typed properties.
trans-unit.target: 這種類型，如同所有其他設定轉換器類型，將相關的強型別屬性與組態檔中找到的字串轉換。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the TimeSpanSecondsOrInfiniteConverter converts <xref:System.String> seconds, assigned to a configuration property, to <xref:System.TimeSpan> seconds, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，將轉換 TimeSpanSecondsOrInfiniteConverter<xref:System.String>秒，為指派給組態屬性，<xref:System.TimeSpan>秒，反之亦然。</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the configuration property has a <xref:System.String> value of "infinite", it converts this value to <xref:System.TimeSpan> and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 如果組態屬性具有<xref:System.String>值設為 「 無限 」，這個值可以轉換<xref:System.TimeSpan>，反之亦然。</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The infinite <xref:System.TimeSpan> value is represented by the <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 無限<xref:System.TimeSpan>值由<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>列舉值。</xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> </xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.TimeSpanSecondsOrInfiniteConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.TimeSpanSecondsOrInfiniteConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you use the converter types provided by the system.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您可以使用系統提供的轉換器類型。

trans-unit.source: The only time you need to use the TimeSpanSecondsOrInfiniteConverter constructor is when you create your own conversion type.
trans-unit.target: 建立您自己的轉換類型時的才需要使用 TimeSpanSecondsOrInfiniteConverter 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.String> to a <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.String>至<xref:System.TimeSpan>。</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The system uses ConvertFrom when reading from a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.String> value to <xref:System.TimeSpan>, or the <xref:System.String> "infinite" to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 系統會使用 ConvertFrom 讀取組態檔時轉換<xref:System.String>值設定為<xref:System.TimeSpan>，或<xref:System.String>「 無限 」 至<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>。</xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used for type conversions.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>用於類型轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>在轉換期間使用的物件。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> object to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要轉換的物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The , if the data parameter is the "infinite"; otherwise, the representing the data parameter in seconds.
trans-unit.target: ，如果 data 參數是「 無限 」，否則代表 data 參數以秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.TimeSpan> to a.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.TimeSpan>到 a。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The system uses ConvertTo when writing to a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value or <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 系統會使用 ConvertTo 寫入組態檔時要轉換的<xref:System.TimeSpan>值或<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>至<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> </xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used for type conversions.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>用於類型轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>在轉換期間使用的物件。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: The conversion type.
trans-unit.target: 轉換類型。

trans-unit.source: The "infinite", if the value parameter is ; otherwise, the representing the value parameter in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 「 無限 」，如果 value 參數是，否則代表 value 參數以秒為單位。
